description: Sample question set for onsen RAG evaluation - each question has correct chunk and evaluation points set

questions.question: What are the basic onsen bathing manners?
Can I use the baths for a day trip?
questions.evaluation_point: Day-trip bathing availability and conditions are included

questions.question: Which spring quality is called the beauty skin spring?
questions.evaluation_point: Beauty skin expression is explicitly stated

questions.question: Which hot spring has low stimulation?
Which spring quality is good for cold sensitivity?
questions.evaluation_point: Relation to cold sensitivity is clearly stated

questions.question: What is the difference between Kusatsu Onsen and Hakone Onsen?
questions.expected_chunk: ■ 草津温泉 + ■ 箱根温泉
questions.evaluation_point: Features of both onsen areas are included

questions.question: Which onsen area is easy to access from Tokyo?
Which onsen area is good for hot spring hopping?
questions.evaluation_point: Output volume and diversity description is included

questions.question: Which onsen area do you recommend for winter?
questions.expected_chunk: ■ 季節ごとの温泉の楽しみ方（冬）+ ■ 草津温泉

questions.question: Which onsen areas can be enjoyed on a day trip?
questions.expected_chunk: ■ 箱根温泉 + ■ 日帰り入浴について

questions.question: Which onsen area is suitable for long stays?
Can I bathe if I have a tattoo?

questions.expected_chunk: ■ 温泉の基本マナー + ■ 単純温泉

evaluation_criteria.accuracy: Does the answer include the correct chunk?
